Accessed on 2008-07-02. | population_total = 209470 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01 | iso_code = DZ-45 | area_code_type = Area Code | area_code = +213 (0) 49 | blank_name_sec1 = Districts | blank_info_sec1 = 7 | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank1_info_sec1 = 12 | website = | footnotes = }} Naâma is a province of Algeria. The capital is the town of Naâma. There is an airport in Mécheria. ==Divisions== The province has 7 districts and 12 communes or municipalities. ===Districts=== # Aïn Séfra # Asla # Mécheria # Mekmen Ben Amar # Moghrar # Naâma # Sfissifa ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
title: Naama Province
